content.text: Trial 5/5, Stage 'slant': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a slanted groove. The groove orientation is primarily along the diagonal from bottom left to top right of the frame.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [175.0, 75.0, 0.0],
    [75.0, 175.0, 0.0],
    [0.0, 0.0, 100.0]
  ]
}
```
